name: soil_data_by_lat_lng
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ambee_soil_data.
Tool description: Global real-time soil API. Integrate soil API for global real-time soil information. Test an API call. Get accurate & actionable data insights. 
API description: Fetches the latest soil data readings for a specified latitude and longitude.

pollutants.description: Specific pollutants to filter the data. Defaults to None.

limit.description: Maximum number of records to retrieve. Defaults to None.
